layout.grid_system: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-6 p-4 md:p-6

buttons.primary: rounded-none border border-primary bg-primary/10 text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-black transition-all duration-300 font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-xs shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(217,70,239,0.2)]
buttons.secondary: rounded-none border border-secondary/50 text-secondary hover:bg-secondary/10 transition-all duration-300 font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-xs

cards.default: rounded-none border border-white/10 bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md p-6 relative overflow-hidden group
cards.interactive: rounded-none border border-white/10 bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md p-6 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 cursor-pointer

inputs.default: rounded-none bg-black/50 border-b-2 border-white/20 focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 px-4 py-3 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 font-mono transition-colors

background_texture.usage: Global background overlay with low opacity

cyberpunk_city.usage: Atmospheric accent for cards or login page

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, sharp edges preferred where possible

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors and font families defined in `design_system.typography` and `design_system.colors`.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import link to `index.css` at the very top.
3. GLOBAL STYLES: Apply the `background` color and `background_texture` (with opacity 0.1) to the `body` in `index.css`.
4. COMPONENTS: When using Shadcn components, override the default `rounded-md` with `rounded-none` or `rounded-sm` to match the brutalist/cyberpunk aesthetic.
5. TERMINAL FEEL: Ensure all text inputs feel like a terminal command line (monospaced, blinking cursor if possible).
6. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento' grid strategy for the dashboard. Mix 2x2, 1x2, and 2x1 blocks.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
8. NO GRADIENT TEXT: Avoid gradient text for accessibility; use gradients for borders or backgrounds instead.
9. TOASTS: Use `sonner` for notifications, styled with a dark background and neon borders.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through z-index and glassmorphism.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
